mapper.select: /* EslInterfaceMapper.selectVTetrplEsl */ SELECT VTRE.STORE_CODE , VTRE.MNT_DATE , VTRE.MNT_TIME , VTRE.PLU_CODE , VTRE.PRICE_SECT , VTRE.START_DATE , VTRE.END_DATE , VTRE.MD_CODE , VTRE.PUM_CODE , VTRE.EVENT_SECT , VTRE.CLASS_CODE , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.PLU_NAME)) AS PLU_NAME , VTRE.CURR_SAL_PRICE , VTRE.GOODS_SECT , VTRE.MG_RATE , VTRE.TAX_FLAG , VTRE.MNT_EMPNO , VTRE.SYS_DATE , VTRE.SYS_TIME , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.ORIGIN_NAME)) AS ORIGIN_NAME , VTRE.NOR_SAL_PRICE , VTRE.CONTENTS_QTY , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.DISPLAY_UNIT_NAME)) AS DISPLAY_UNIT_NAME , VTRE.DISPLAY_UNIT_QTY , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.BRAND_NAME)) AS BRAND_NAME , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.SELLNG_PNT)) AS SELLNG_PNT , VTRE.GOOS_AUTH_IMG , VTRE.WINE_SUGR_CONT , VTRE.WINE_BODY , VTRE.WINE_KIND , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.WINE_EVAL_1)) AS WINE_EVAL_1 , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.WINE_EVAL_2)) AS WINE_EVAL_2 , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.WINE_EVAL_3)) AS WINE_EVAL_3 , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.WINE_PLOR)) AS WINE_PLOR , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.WINE_ITEM_KIND)) AS WINE_ITEM_KIND , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.WINE_VINT)) AS WINE_VINT , VTRE.MOBL_CUP_GOOS_YN , VTRE.LAYOUT_GUBN_1 , VTRE.LAYOUT_GUBN_2 , VTRE.GOOS_INFO_IMG FROM IF_ESL_DPT0.V_TETRPL_ESL VTRE WHERE VTRE.STORE_CODE = '14' AND LPAD(TO_NUMBER(VTRE.MNT_TIME), 6, 0) BETWEEN LPAD(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MI') - INTERVAL '30' MINUTE, 'HH24MI') || '00'), 6, 0) AND LPAD(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS')), 6, 0)

/* EslInterfaceMapper.selectVTetrplEslA */ SELECT VTRE.STORE_CODE , VTRE.PLU_CODE , VTRE.PRICE_SECT , VTRE.START_DATE , VTRE.END_DATE , VTRE.MD_CODE , VTRE.PUM_CODE , VTRE.EVENT_SECT , VTRE.CLASS_CODE , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.PLU_NAME)) AS PLU_NAME , VTRE.CURR_SAL_PRICE , VTRE.GOODS_SECT , VTRE.MG_RATE , VTRE.TAX_FLAG , VTRE.SYS_DATE , VTRE.SYS_TIME , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.ORIGIN_NAME)) AS ORIGIN_NAME , VTRE.NOR_SAL_PRICE , VTRE.CONTENTS_QTY , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.DISPLAY_UNIT_NAME)) AS DISPLAY_UNIT_NAME , VTRE.DISPLAY_UNIT_QTY , (SELECT DEAL_GUBN FROM V_TETPLU_ESL WHERE PLU_CODE = VTRE.PLU_CODE AND STORE_CODE = '14') AS DEAL_GUBN , (SELECT ORIGIN_CODE FROM V_TETPLU_ESL WHERE PLU_CODE = VTRE.PLU_CODE AND STORE_CODE = '14') AS ORIGIN_CODE , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.BRAND_NAME)) AS BRAND_NAME , (SELECT CATE_CODE FROM V_TETPLU_ESL WHERE PLU_CODE = VTRE.PLU_CODE AND STORE_CODE = '14') AS CATE_CODE , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX((SELECT CATE_NAME FROM V_TETPLU_ESL WHERE PLU_CODE = VTRE.PLU_CODE AND STORE_CODE = '14'))) AS CATE_NAME , (SELECT MOD_DATE FROM V_TETPLU_ESL WHERE PLU_CODE = VTRE.PLU_CODE AND STORE_CODE = '14') AS MOD_DATE , (SELECT MOD_TIME FROM V_TETPLU_ESL WHERE PLU_CODE = VTRE.PLU_CODE AND STORE_CODE = '14') AS MOD_TIME , (SELECT MOD_EMPNO FROM V_TETPLU_ESL WHERE PLU_CODE = VTRE.PLU_CODE AND STORE_CODE = '14') AS MOD_EMPNO , (SELECT IF_DATE FROM V_TETPLU_ESL WHERE PLU_CODE = VTRE.PLU_CODE AND STORE_CODE = '14') AS IF_DATE , (SELECT IF_TIME FROM V_TETPLU_ESL WHERE PLU_CODE = VTRE.PLU_CODE AND STORE_CODE = '14') AS IF_TIME , (SELECT IF_EMPNO FROM V_TETPLU_ESL WHERE PLU_CODE = VTRE.PLU_CODE AND STORE_CODE = '14') AS IF_EMPNO , (SELECT DISPLAY_UNIT_PRICE FROM V_TETPLU_ESL WHERE PLU_CODE = VTRE.PLU_CODE AND STORE_CODE = '14') AS DISPLAY_UNIT_PRICE , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.SELLNG_PNT)) AS SELLNG_PNT , VTRE.GOOS_AUTH_IMG , VTRE.WINE_SUGR_CONT , VTRE.WINE_BODY , VTRE.WINE_KIND , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.WINE_EVAL_1)) AS WINE_EVAL_1 , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.WINE_EVAL_2)) AS WINE_EVAL_2 , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.WINE_EVAL_3)) AS WINE_EVAL_3 , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.WINE_PLOR)) AS WINE_PLOR , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.WINE_ITEM_KIND)) AS WINE_ITEM_KIND , TO_CHAR(RAWTOHEX(VTRE.WINE_VINT)) AS WINE_VINT , VTRE.MOBL_CUP_GOOS_YN , VTRE.LAYOUT_GUBN_1 , VTRE.LAYOUT_GUBN_2 , '' AS PLOR_ORIGIN_NAME , CONCAT(VTRE.CONTENTS_QTY, VTRE.DISPLAY_UNIT_NAME) AS CONTENTS_QTY_UNIT , '' AS QR_CODE , CASE WHEN VTRE.CONTENTS_QTY IS NOT NULL AND VTRE.CONTENTS_QTY > 0 THEN CASE WHEN TRIM(VTRE.DISPLAY_UNIT_NAME) = 'ml' THEN ROUND((VTRE.CURR_SAL_PRICE/VTRE.CONTENTS_QTY) * 100) WHEN TRIM(VTRE.DISPLAY_UNIT_NAME) = 'L' THEN ROUND((VTRE.CURR_SAL_PRICE/VTRE.CONTENTS_QTY) * 1000 * 100) ELSE NULL END ELSE NULL END AS COMBINE_DISPLAY_UNIT_PRICE , VTRE.GOOS_INFO_IMG AS GOOS_INFO_IMG FROM IF_ESL_DPT0.V_TETRPL_ESL VTRE WHERE VTRE.STORE_CODE = '14' AND LPAD(TO_NUMBER(VTRE.MNT_TIME), 6, 0) BETWEEN LPAD(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MI') - INTERVAL '30' MINUTE, 'HH24MI') || '00'), 6, 0) AND LPAD(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS')), 6, 0)
